finalProject

Class GraphicObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • finalProject.GraphicObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApplicationConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerFace, StickFigure

    public abstract class GraphicObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements ApplicationConstants
    This abstract class is the parent class for all classes of graphic objects. It stores all the instance variable describing the position-dimension-color-motion attributes of a graphic object. It defines that abstract draw and update methods that its subclasses must implement
    Author:
    jyh

      • absoluteBox_

        protected BoundingBox[] absoluteBox_
        Every GraphicObject must store and update at least one absolute bounding box. The bounding box at index 0 should be the global bounding box of the object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphicObject

        public GraphicObject(float x,
                     float y,
                     float angle,
                     float width,
                     float height,
                     int color,
                     float vx,
                     float vy,
                     float spin,
                     float accelv,
                     float angularv)
        Constructor. Initializes all instance variables to the values set by the arguments
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the object's center (in world coordinates)
        y - y coordinate of the object's center (in world coordinates)
        angle - orientation of the object (in rad)
        width - width of the object (in world units)
        height - height of the object (in world units)
        color - The color is stored as a single int in hex format
        vx - Horizontal component of the object's velocity vector (in world units per second)
        vy - Vertical component of the object's velocity vector (in world units per second)
        spin - Spin of the object (in rad/s)
        accelv_ - The acceleration vector in the way the object is pointing
        angularv - The angular velocity in which the object is spinning

                     float y,
                     float angle,
                     float width,

        Constructor for static objects. Initializes all non-dynamic instance variables to the values set by the arguments
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the object's center (in world coordinates)
        y - y coordinate of the object's center (in world coordinates)
        angle - orientation of the object (in rad)
        width - width of the object (in world units)
        height - height of the object (in world units)
        color - The color is stored as a single int in hex format
        accelv_ - The acceleration vector in the way the object is pointing
        angularv - The angular velocity in which the object is spinning

                     float accelv,

        Constructor. Creates a random object at set location

        public GraphicObject()
        Default constructor. Initializes all instance variables with random values.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PGraphics g)
        Renders this object.
        Parameters:
        g - The Processing application in which the action takes place

      • draw_

        protected abstract void draw_(processing.core.PGraphics app)
        Declare the method that subclasses must implement. When this method is called, we are already in the reference frame of the object, so the implementation of this method should not invoke translate/rotate
        Parameters:
        app - The Processing application in which the action takes place

      • updateAbsoluteBoxes_

        protected abstract void updateAbsoluteBoxes_()
        Computes the new dimensions of the object's absolute bounding boxes, for the object's current position and orientation.

      • update

        public void update(float dt)
        The more complex animation method, where wee need to handle "hit a window edge" situations. Must be implemented by subclasses. This method will only be called for instances of classes that implement AnimatedObject.
        Parameters:
        dt - time elapsed since last invocation

      • isVisibleInQuadrant

        public boolean isVisibleInQuadrant(int quad)
        Getter method for the quadrant visibility array
        Parameters:
        quad - the quadrant to check
        Returns:
        whether this object is visible in the quadrant specified

      • randomByte_

        private static byte randomByte_()
        Utility random generator
        Returns:
        random unsigned byte value [0-255]

      • isInside

        public abstract boolean isInside(float x,
                                 float y)
        Method to be implemented by subclasses, to determine whether a world point is inside the object
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the point
        y - y coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        true if the point (x, y) is inside this object.

      • isInside

        public boolean isInside(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float pt)
        Method to invoke determine whether a world point is inside the object
        Parameters:
        pt - the point for which to perform the test
        Returns:
        true if the point (x, y) is inside this object.
